verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- The word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai to לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. came again unto me saying

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- Son אָדָ֕ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam of man הִנָּבֵא֙ <S%H5012><s%> hin-na-Ve prophesy וְאָ֣מַרְתָּ֔ <S%H559><s%> ve-'A-mar-ta, and say כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> koh Thus אָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh; GOD הֵילִ֖ילוּ <S%H3213><s%> hei-Li-lu Howl הָ֥הּ <S%H1929><s%> hah ye Woe worth לַיּֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> lai-Yom. the day

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for קָר֣וֹב <S%H7138><s%> ka-Rov [is] near י֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> Yom, For the day וְקָר֥וֹב <S%H7138><s%> ve-ka-Rov [is] near י֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> Yom even the day לַֽיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; of the LORD י֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> Yom day עָנָ֔ן <S%H6051><s%> 'a-Nan, a cloudy עֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> 'et it shall be the time גּוֹיִ֖ם <S%H1471><s%> go-Yim of the heathen יִֽהְיֶֽה׃ <S%H1961><s%> Yih-Yeh. become

וּבָאָ֥ה <S%H935><s%> u-va-'Ah shall come חֶ֙רֶב֙ <S%H2719><s%> che-rev And the sword בְּמִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> be-mitz-Ra-yim, upon Egypt וְהָיְתָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-ye-Tah become חַלְחָלָה֙ <S%H2479><s%> chal-cha-Lah and great pain בְּכ֔וּשׁ <S%H3568><s%> be-Chush, shall be in Ethiopia בִּנְפֹ֥ל <S%H5307><s%> bin-Fol shall fall חָלָ֖ל <S%H2491><s%> cha-Lal when the slain בְּמִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> be-mitz-Ra-yim; in Egypt וְלָקְח֣וּ <S%H3947><s%> ve-la-ke-Chu and they shall take away הֲמוֹנָ֔הּ <S%H1995><s%> ha-mo-Nah, her multitude וְנֶהֶרְס֖וּ <S%H2040><s%> ve-ne-her-Su shall be broken down יְסוֹדֹתֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H3247><s%> ye-so-do-Tei-ha. and her foundations

כּ֣וּשׁ <S%H3568><s%> kush Ethiopia וּפ֤וּט <S%H6316><s%> u-Fut and Libya וְלוּד֙ <S%H3865><s%> ve-Lud and Lydia וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol all הָעֶ֣רֶב <S%H6154><s%> ha-'E-rev Arabia וְכ֔וּב <S%H3552><s%> ve-Chuv, people and Chub וּבְנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei and the men אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz of the land הַבְּרִ֑ית <S%H1285><s%> hab-be-Rit; that is in league אִתָּ֖ם <S%H854><s%> 'it-Tam by בַּחֶ֥רֶב <S%H2719><s%> ba-Che-rev with them by the sword יִפֹּֽלוּ׃ <S%H5307><s%> yip-Po-lu. shall fall פ Peh

כֹּ֚ה <S%H3541><s%> koh Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh, GOD וְנָֽפְלוּ֙ <S%H5307><s%> ve-na-fe-Lu shall fall סֹמְכֵ֣י <S%H5564><s%> so-me-Chei They also that uphold מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim, Egypt וְיָרַ֖ד <S%H3381><s%> ve-ya-Rad shall come down גְּא֣וֹן <S%H1347><s%> ge-'on and the pride עֻזָּ֑הּ <S%H5797><s%> 'uz-Zah; of her power מִמִּגְדֹּ֣ל <S%H4024><s%> mi-mig-Dol from the tower סְוֵנֵ֗ה <S%H5482><s%> se-ve-Neh, of Syene בַּחֶ֙רֶב֙ <S%H2719><s%> ba-Che-rev in it by the sword יִפְּלוּ־ <S%H5307><s%> yip-pe-lu- shall they fall בָ֔הּ Vah, נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> ne-'Um saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. the LORD

וְנָשַׁ֕מּוּ <S%H8074><s%> ve-na-Sham-mu And they shall be desolate בְּת֖וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> be-Toch in the midst אֲרָצ֣וֹת <S%H776><s%> a-ra-Tzot of the countries נְשַׁמּ֑וֹת <S%H8074><s%> ne-sham-Mot; [that are] desolate וְעָרָ֕יו <S%H5892><s%> ve-'a-Rav and her cities בְּתוֹךְ־ <S%H8432><s%> be-toch- shall be in the midst עָרִ֥ים <S%H5892><s%> 'a-Rim of the cities נַחֲרָב֖וֹת <S%H2717><s%> na-cha-ra-Vot [that are] wasted תִּֽהְיֶֽינָה׃ <S%H1961><s%> Tih-Yei-nah. become

וְיָדְע֖וּ <S%H3045><s%> ve-ya-de-'U And they shall know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- that אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; that I [am] the LORD בְּתִתִּי־ <S%H5414><s%> be-tit-ti- when I have set אֵ֣שׁ <S%H784><s%> 'esh a fire בְּמִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> be-mitz-Ra-yim, in Egypt וְנִשְׁבְּר֖וּ <S%H7665><s%> ve-nish-be-Ru shall be destroyed כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and all עֹזְרֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H5826><s%> 'o-ze-Rei-ha. and [when] all her helpers

בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> bai-Yom In that day הַה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu, he יֵצְא֨וּ <S%H3318><s%> ye-tze-'U go forth מַלְאָכִ֤ים <S%H4397><s%> mal-'a-Chim shall messengers מִלְּפָנַי֙ <S%H6440><s%> mil-le-fa-Nai from me בַּצִּ֔ים <S%H6716><s%> batz-Tzim, in ships לְהַחֲרִ֖יד <S%H2729><s%> le-ha-cha-Rid afraid אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כּ֣וּשׁ <S%H3568><s%> kush Ethiopians בֶּ֑טַח <S%H983><s%> Be-tach; to make the careless וְהָיְתָ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-ye-Tah become חַלְחָלָ֤ה <S%H2479><s%> chal-cha-Lah and great pain בָהֶם֙ va-Hem בְּי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> be-Yom shall come upon them as in the day מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim, of Egypt כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for הִנֵּ֖ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh behold בָּאָֽה׃ <S%H935><s%> ba-'Ah. for lo it cometh ס sa-Mek

כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> koh Thus אָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh; GOD וְהִשְׁבַּתִּי֙ <S%H7673><s%> ve-hish-bat-Ti to cease אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הֲמ֣וֹן <S%H1995><s%> ha-Mon I will also make the multitude מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim, of Egypt בְּיַ֖ד <S%H3027><s%> be-Yad by the hand נְבוּכַדְרֶאצַּ֥ר <S%H5019><s%> ne-vu-chad-retz-Tzar of Nebuchadrezzar מֶלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- king בָּבֶֽל׃ <S%H894><s%> ba-Vel. of Babylon

ה֠וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu He וְעַמּ֤וֹ <S%H5971><s%> ve-'am-Mo He and his people אִתּוֹ֙ <S%H854><s%> it-To for עָרִיצֵ֣י <S%H6184><s%> 'a-ri-Tzei with him the terrible גוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> go-Yim, of the nations מֽוּבָאִ֖ים <S%H935><s%> mu-va-'Im shall be brought לְשַׁחֵ֣ת <S%H7843><s%> le-sha-Chet to destroy הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz; the land וְהֵרִ֤יקוּ <S%H7324><s%> ve-he-Ri-ku and they shall draw חַרְבוֹתָם֙ <S%H2719><s%> char-vo-Tam their swords עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- against מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim, against Egypt וּמָלְא֥וּ <S%H4390><s%> u-mal-'U and fill אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz the land חָלָֽל׃ <S%H2491><s%> cha-Lal. with the slain

וְנָתַתִּ֤י <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-tat-Ti And I will make יְאֹרִים֙ <S%H2975><s%> ye-'o-Rim the rivers חָֽרָבָ֔ה <S%H2724><s%> cha-ra-Vah, dry וּמָכַרְתִּ֥י <S%H4376><s%> u-ma-char-Ti and sell אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz the land בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> be-yad- into the hand רָעִ֑ים <S%H7451><s%> ra-'Im; of the wicked וַהֲשִׁמֹּתִ֞י <S%H8074><s%> va-ha-shim-mo-Ti waste אֶ֤רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz and I will make the land וּמְלֹאָהּ֙ <S%H4393><s%> u-me-lo-'Ah and all that is therein בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> be-yad- by the hand זָרִ֔ים <S%H2114><s%> za-Rim, of strangers אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh I the LORD דִּבַּֽרְתִּי׃ <S%H1696><s%> dib-Bar-ti. have spoken ס sa-Mek

כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> koh- Thus אָמַ֞ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh GOD וְהַאֲבַדְתִּ֨י <S%H6><s%> ve-ha-'a-vad-Ti I will also destroy גִלּוּלִ֜ים <S%H1544><s%> gil-lu-Lim the idols וְהִשְׁבַּתִּ֤י <S%H7673><s%> ve-hish-bat-Ti to cease אֱלִילִים֙ <S%H457><s%> 'e-li-Lim and I will cause [their] images מִנֹּ֔ף <S%H5297><s%> min-Nof, out of Noph וְנָשִׂ֥יא <S%H5387><s%> ve-na-Si and there shall be no more a prince מֵאֶֽרֶץ־ <S%H776><s%> me-'e-retz- of the land מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim of Egypt לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo will no יִֽהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> yih-yeh- become ע֑וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od; longer וְנָתַתִּ֥י <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-tat-Ti and I will put יִרְאָ֖ה <S%H3374><s%> yir-'Ah a fear בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> be-'E-retz in the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim. of Egypt

וַהֲשִׁמֹּתִי֙ <S%H8074><s%> va-ha-shim-mo-Ti desolate אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- פַּתְר֔וֹס <S%H6624><s%> pat-Ros, And I will make Pathros וְנָתַ֥תִּי <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-Tat-ti and will set אֵ֖שׁ <S%H784><s%> 'esh fire בְּצֹ֑עַן <S%H6814><s%> be-Tzo-'an; in Zoan וְעָשִׂ֥יתִי <S%H6213><s%> ve-'a-Si-ti and will execute שְׁפָטִ֖ים <S%H8201><s%> she-fa-Tim judgments בְּנֹֽא׃ <S%H4996><s%> be-No. in No

וְשָׁפַכְתִּ֣י <S%H8210><s%> ve-sha-fach-Ti And I will pour חֲמָתִ֔י <S%H2534><s%> cha-ma-Ti, my fury עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on סִ֖ין <S%H5512><s%> sin upon Sin מָע֣וֹז <S%H4581><s%> ma-'oz the strength מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim; of Egypt וְהִכְרַתִּ֖י <S%H3772><s%> ve-hich-rat-Ti and I will cut off אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הֲמ֥וֹן <S%H1995><s%> ha-Mon the multitude נֹֽא׃ <S%H4996><s%> No. of No

וְנָתַ֤תִּי <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-Tat-ti And I will set אֵשׁ֙ <S%H784><s%> 'esh fire בְּמִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> be-mitz-Ra-yim, in Egypt ח֤וּל <S%H2342><s%> chul shall have great; תָּחִיל ta-chil כתָּחוּל֙ <S%H2342><s%> ta-Chul will writhe קסִ֔ין <S%H5512><s%> Sin, Sin וְנֹ֖א <S%H4996><s%> ve-No and No תִּהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> tih-Yeh become לְהִבָּקֵ֑עַ <S%H1234><s%> le-hib-ba-Ke-a'; shall be rent asunder וְנֹ֖ף <S%H5297><s%> ve-Nof and Noph צָרֵ֥י <S%H6862><s%> tza-Rei [shall have] distresses יוֹמָֽם׃ <S%H3119><s%> yo-Mam. daily

בַּח֥וּרֵי <S%H970><s%> ba-Chu-rei The young men אָ֛וֶן <S%H206><s%> 'A-ven of Aven וּפִי־ u-fi- בֶ֖סֶת <S%H6364><s%> Ve-set and of Pibeseth בַּחֶ֣רֶב <S%H2719><s%> ba-Che-rev by the sword יִפֹּ֑לוּ <S%H5307><s%> yip-Po-lu; shall fall וְהֵ֖נָּה <S%H2007><s%> ve-Hen-nah into בַּשְּׁבִ֥י <S%H7628><s%> bash-she-Vi into captivity תֵלַֽכְנָה׃ <S%H1980><s%> te-Lach-nah. will go

וּבִֽתְחַפְנְחֵס֙ <S%H8471><s%> u-vit-chaf-ne-Ches At Tehaphnehes חָשַׂ֣ךְ <S%H2821><s%> cha-Sach will be dark הַיּ֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom, also the day בְּשִׁבְרִי־ <S%H7665><s%> be-shiv-ri- when I shall break שָׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> sham there אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מֹט֣וֹת <S%H4133><s%> mo-Tot there the yokes מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim, of Egypt וְנִשְׁבַּת־ <S%H7673><s%> ve-nish-bat- shall cease בָּ֖הּ bah גְּא֣וֹן <S%H1347><s%> ge-'on and the pomp עֻזָּ֑הּ <S%H5797><s%> 'uz-Zah; of her strength הִ֚יא <S%H1931><s%> hi in her עָנָ֣ן <S%H6051><s%> 'a-Nan as for her a cloud יְכַסֶּ֔נָּה <S%H3680><s%> ye-chas-Sen-nah, shall cover וּבְנוֹתֶ֖יהָ <S%H1323><s%> u-ve-no-Tei-ha her and her daughters בַּשְּׁבִ֥י <S%H7628><s%> bash-she-Vi into captivity תֵלַֽכְנָה׃ <S%H1980><s%> te-Lach-nah. will go
